# Generated by "yarp cmake" & Juan G. Victores 2014

set(KEYWORD "InputLib")

find_package(SDL2 REQUIRED)

add_library(${KEYWORD} InputEventListener.hpp
                       InputManager.hpp
                       InputManager.cpp
                       Key.hpp
                       Key.cpp
                       MockInputEventListener.hpp
                       MockInputEventListener.cpp
                       MockInputManager.hpp
                       MockInputManager.cpp
                       SDLEventFactory.hpp
                       SDLEventFactory.cpp
                       SDLInputManager.hpp
                       SDLInputManager.cpp
                       WindowEvent.hpp
                       WindowEvent.cpp)

target_include_directories(${KEYWORD} PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
                                             ${SDL2_INCLUDE_DIR})

target_link_libraries(${KEYWORD} PUBLIC ${SDL2_LIBRARY}
                                 PRIVATE UtilsLib)
